name: Moving Forward (Daniel Clute)
description:
Hello!

Controls: Arrow Keys or WASD

 How to Play:

The goal is to pick up patrons and bring them to their destinations! Pick up patron by entering into their circle and coming to a complete stop. In order to drop them off at their destination, just do the same thing!

For each patron picked up, you will receive 10 more seconds.

For each patron delivered, you will receive 100 extra points.

 

-Made for the MysteryMan Game Jam!
